thread.title: 37 dead in Russian shopping mall fire - Russian agencies

title: 37 dead in Russian shopping mall fire - Russian agencies
text:
37 dead in Russian shopping mall fire - Russian agencies 1:42am BST - 00:44 
At least 37 people are dead after fire broke out in a shopping mall in the city of Kemerovo, Russia, about 3,600 kilometers east of Moscow, according to officials. Rough Cut (no reporter narration.)
